title: Lazard Beats Expectations, Thanks to M&A
text:
Lazard Ltd. said profit soared in its third quarter, as higher revenue in the investment bankâ€™s merger advisory businesses and cost cuts offset lower management fees.
Results beat Wall Street expectations.
The investment bank reported a profit of $399 million, up from $88.9 million a year earlier. Per-share earnings rose to $2.99 from 67... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
